author: nick
msg: Following discussions on the dev list, add a little bit about current code formatting guidelines

author: arkurth
msg: Updated run_ssh_command calls in Linux.pm to use $self->execute.
Updated changepasswd subroutine in Linux.pm and Ubuntu.pm. The code was not checking the output for problems.
Reworked Linux.pm::is_connected. It was not checking for undefined output.

author: nick
msg: Patch from Raúl Wegmann from bug #56735 / GitHub Pull #10 - Rationalise POI temp file creation to the TempFile util class, and allow a system wide setting of where Temp files (eg for SXSSF) go, via TempFile / TempFileCreationStrategy

author: jleroux
msg: Fixes some typos in comments of TaxAuthorityServices class
